name: Loko game
description:
Loko means color in Malagasy language.
Loko game is a game about color, a motion based recognition endless game made during #gamejamplus 2021, Antananarivo

Goal:
The goal is to survive by collecting boxes that is the same color as the main character and by avoiding boxes of the other colors.
You can switch the character main color by hiting green spheres.
If you hit the wrong color, your health point will decrease.
Some color switcher item are suspended in the air. You can get them by jumping.

Gameplay
Move left or right and the main character will follow you
Jump, and the main character will jump like you

Interface/UI

Health: is the heal of main character

Command: is where your webcam video appears

Reset: rest the game

Quit: Quit the game

Switch webcam: if you hafe a multiple webcam associated with you computer, you can switch through webcams by clicking this button

Requirement:
A webcam or another virtual webcam (eg droidcam throught Android device) is mandatory

Enjoy

Please, fill free to report bugs (or improvment). It'll drasticly help the development
